::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe swears silently as he flies through the air. He should have 
finished off that cursed bot. The job would be done and DeathScythe out of 
range before the Maximals even found the body! He growls. Next time they 
meet, that Maximal would not be so lucky.

The assassin continues flying north, cursing the Maximals.
